pages.text: This book details the potent magical power of...flowers? It seems that certain Mystical Flowers throughout the world were blessed with power from a distant realm, allowing the creating of many magical gadgets. Quite Neat.

pages.title: Lexica Botania
pages.text: $(o)Fun Fact: the creator of Botania, Vazkii, also created Patchouli, the framework used to write this book.$()
